titles.title: I Will Sing The Wondrous Story (Francis H. Rowley)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me. How He left His home in glory For the cross of Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was lost, but Jesus found me, Found the sheep that went astray, Threw His loving arms around me, Drew me back into His way.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was bruised, but Jesus healed me, Faint was I from many a fall, Sight was gone, and fears possessed me, But He freed me from them all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He will keep me till the river Rolls its waters at my feet; Then He’ll bear me safely over, Where the loved ones I shall meet. 10. Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ Who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.{/lang-eng}
